channel.title: Reborn Tragedy New 24-7 317 Need Staff and players
channel.description:
Play Now at: http://reborntragedy.net/ Homepage - Reborntragedy.net Webclient - http://reborntragedy.net/play.html
What Makes Reborn Tragedy Different From Other Servers:
We are [b]NEVER [/b]down We have a amazing community. We have Dedicated Coders There is always someone online to help We actually take our players suggestions into consideration We are not all about getting money We have regular Updates
Features:
VPS Hosted Vote System HiScores (Coming soon..) IpBoard! Great Staff Great Coders Daily Updates! Perfect Combat System Many Bosses Great Donator Benefits Active PvP Great Skiller benefits Loads of Content Korasi Torva Pernix Virtus 100% Money Pouch 100% Barrows Many Minigames! Unique new Runescape Gear. and Much More Content!
Misc:
Double Exp Weekends Vote4cash hiscores(coming soon..).
http://reborntragedy.net/ http://reborntragedy.net/ http://reborntragedy.net/ http://reborntragedy.net/ http://reborntragedy.net/
